MWC.GUI.SplitPanel

Interface ItemPaintSite


  • public interface ItemPaintSite
    This interface is implemented where ItemPainters can be provided with more information about their host containers fonts, margins, colors, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAlignment()
      Returns the alignment setting for the item being painted.
      java.awt.Color getBackground()
      Returns the background color for the item being painted.
      java.awt.Font getFont()
      Returns the font to use for the item being painted.
      java.awt.Color getForeground()
      Returns the foreground color for the item being painted.
      java.awt.Insets getItemMargins()
      Returns the item margins for the item being painted.

    • Method Detail

      • getBackground

        java.awt.Color getBackground()
        Returns the background color for the item being painted.

      • getForeground

        java.awt.Color getForeground()
        Returns the foreground color for the item being painted.

      • getFont

        java.awt.Font getFont()
        Returns the font to use for the item being painted.

      • getAlignment

        int getAlignment()
        Returns the alignment setting for the item being painted.
        See Also:
        for alignment settings.

      • getItemMargins

        java.awt.Insets getItemMargins()
        Returns the item margins for the item being painted.
